title: aruvanAi irundu
sahitya:
aruvanAi irundu oruvanAi siranda muruganai irandu nI urutuNai peru manamE


anupallavi

  siruvanAi irundum shivanAr viyandiDa praNava mantramadan poruLai uraittavan


caraNam    peru vinait-tollaiyunai varuttam uruttAmal pErinbap-pETrinai vArit-taravE avanai
karudi dinam pOTri karainduruginAl parivODu tannaruLai viraivilE taruvAnE
